name: IMPERVA SECURESPHERE [Stream Signature Violation]
description: This rule looks for high-severity Imperva SecureSphere Stream Signature Violation WAF alerts. These alerts include detection of attack attempts within TCP streams.
tags: imperva,securesphere,waf,stream signature violation,Initial Access,Exploit Public-Facing Application,T1190,md-info
query: class=imperva_securesphere [info,eventname]=`stream signature violation` severity=high NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: IMPERVA SECURESPHERE [HTTP Signature Violation]
description: This rule looks for high-severity Imperva SecureSphere HTTP Signature Violation WAF alerts. These alerts include detection of exploitation attempts for known web application vulnerabilities as well as other web application attack types. Alerting for this rule is disabled by default.
tags: imperva,securesphere,waf,http signature violation,Initial Access,Exploit Public-Facing Application,T1190,md-info
query: class=imperva_securesphere [info,eventname]=`http signature violation` severity=high NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: IMPERVA SECURESPHERE [SQL Injection]
description: This rule looks for high-severity Imperva SecureSphere SQL Injection WAF alerts.

name: IMPERVA SECURESPHERE [Cross-Site Scripting]
description: This rule looks for high-severity Imperva SecureSphere Cross-Site Scripting WAF alerts. Alerting for this rule is disabled by default.
